map.title: OkapiFind
map.locationSavedMessage: Your car location has been saved successfully.

settings.title: Settings
settings.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
settings.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

onboarding.step1Description: OkapiFind helps you remember where you parked your car using smart detection and GPS tracking.
onboarding.step2Description: Our AI automatically detects when you park and saves your location without any manual input.
onboarding.step3Description: Get turn-by-turn directions back to your car with voice guidance and AR navigation.
onboarding.step4Description: Your location data is stored securely on your device and never shared without your permission.
onboarding.locationRequired: Location access is required for OkapiFind to work properly.
onboarding.notificationsOptional: Get notified when your parking is automatically detected.
onboarding.youAreReady: You're ready to start using OkapiFind.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.location: Failed to get your location. Please check location permissions.
errors.parking: Failed to save parking location. Please try again.
errors.auth: Authentication failed. Please sign in again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.
errors.invalidInput: Invalid input. Please check your data and try again.
errors.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please enable required permissions in settings.

accessibility.mapView: Map view showing your location and car position

location.title: Location Permission
location.message: OkapiFind needs access to your location to help you find your car.
location.denied: Location permission was denied. Please enable it in Settings.
location.restricted: Location access is restricted. Please check your device settings.

notifications.title: Notification Permission
notifications.message: Allow notifications to get alerts when your parking is detected.
notifications.denied: Notification permission was denied. You can enable it later in Settings.

camera.title: Camera Permission
camera.message: Camera access is needed for AR navigation features.
camera.denied: Camera permission was denied. AR features will not be available.
